In England, in the seven days to 10 September, there were 174,360 new confirmed cases (308.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 September, there were 184,202 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 5% (9,842 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 September is 6,258,872 (11,067.8 cases per 100,000 population).
